name: Payday
0:
”Alexa, open Pay Day”
”Alexa, ask Pay Day when I get my salary”
”Alexa, ask Pay Day if it's today”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pay day
des: Ask Payday when you'll get your hard earned money and it will reply with a date based on your postal code. Please note that this skill will assume that you get your salary on the 25th each month.
